summary:
The 69th Eurovision Song Contest will be held in Basel, Switzerland, in 2025. Switzerland won the right to host after their victory in 2024 with the song "The Code." The event will be organized by the European Broadcasting Union and the Swiss Broadcasting Corporation.

The contest will take place at St. Jakobshalle, with two semi-finals on May 13 and 15, and the grand final on May 17, 2025. Get ready for some exciting music and performances!
title: Eurovision Song Contest 2025
